about_the_game:
Shattered Melodies is a wild and rhythmic whirlwind through a vibrant musical world. Featuring original music, dexterity quests, exciting puzzles, and beat based challenges, you can slash and shred your way though a barrage of baddies as you wield your enchanted guitar. Taking the role of Attrell, you’ll level up by scoring enchanted gear, mystical allies, and good old-fashioned bust-‘em-upside-the-head fun.

Wield Attrell’s enchanted guitar as you hack and slash you way through wild foes—leveling up and adding weapons to your arsenal as you gather victories and allies.

Battle outrageous bosses to free captured musical muses. With each boss you beat down, you gain a portion of their power to add to your own skill set.

Test your prowess with a myriad of puzzles based on rhythm and beats, or logic-based matching to unlock new areas and challenges.

Maximize your flex by freeing muses and unlocking new platforming abilities that allow you to reach new heights, and discover hidden secrets, and unearth forgotten relics of bygone eras.

Loot pursuit! Fill your pockets with loot from chests scattered all over the realm hiding cold hard Soronian cash, healing, stat gains, and combat level ups!

Traverse the unique and musical world of Soronos as you discover ancient lore, meet colorful characters, and reveal secret mysteries that connect Attrell to this mystical land.

Since the passing of his mother and the disappearance of his father, Attrell has done his best fending for himself and his younger sister Lyra. Despite their hardships, the two find solace in music and frequently spend their evenings outside, playing music or writing songs. Their lives are changed forever when a terrifying beast from another world appears and pulls Lyra through a portal into the strange realm of Soronos.

Attrell meets Celine, an injured muse from Soronos, and helps to heal her in exchange for passage into her world to rescue his kidnapped sister. After passing into Soronos, Attrell finds himself in a beautiful but troubled land built upon principals of music and harmony, but currently under attack from a vicious entity known as Discordia.

Attrell must summon all his courage, skill, and soul to overcome the many challenges needed to rescue his sister, battle through a myriad of malevolent minions, defeat Discordia, and discover the hidden connection between this magic land, and his own special family.
